<Extension()> Public Function ListMetricsAsync (operations As ICollectionPartitionOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, databaseRid As String, collectionRid As String, filter As String, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of PartitionMetric))

static member ListMetricsAsync : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.ICollectionPartitionOperations * string * string * string * string * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.Models.PartitionMetric>>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Fluent.CollectionPartitionOperationsExtensions.ListMetricsAsync (operations, resourceGroupName, accountName, databaseRid, collectionRid, filter, cancellationToken)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Name of an Azure resource group.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given collection, split by partition.

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Name of an Azure resource group.
An OData filter expression that describes a subset of usages to return. The supported parameter is name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names).
Docs.summary: Retrieves the usages (most recent storage data) for the given collection, split by partition.
